titleStmt.title: Despatch from Rainilaiarivony to Chester A. Arthur, August 20, 1885

bibl.title: Despatch from Rainilaiarivony to Chester A. Arthur, August 20, 1885
Despatches from United States Consuls in Boma, 1888-1895
bibl.publisher: National Archives and Records Service General Services Administration

div1.p: Your Excellency Giving to the friendly relations existing between the two Governments I have the honour to forward you herewith, for your Lordships personal a copy of the "Red Book" just issued relative to the recent negotations between Her Majesty's Government and the French Plenipotentiaries at Tamatave through the friendly mediation of His Nation Majesty's Consul W: C Maigrot.
Her Malagasy Majesty's Go- vernment, trust, that your Lord- ships Government in persisting the said Red Book, will credit them with the good intention as ever of bringing about a happy sol- tion
div1.ab: His Excellency The United States Secretary for Soverign Affairs
div1.p:
solution in the present diffi- culty. May God bless your Exce- llency, Faith, your friend,
(sig.) Rainilaiarivony Prime Minister
